title: Milky Way Tango
description: Milky Way Tango kicks off the Belt Stories, a quest fueled by young romance. On a date, first-time lovers Jimmy and Sarah encounter violence. Jimmy reacts with greater violence and ends up exiled to a navigation station near a nebula, fifteen hundred light years away, his dreams of college reduced to ash, his survival now at risk. Left behind on Ambrosa, Sarah tries to resurrect her life. She attends college, studies hard, makes a friend, and tries to forget Jimmy. But it is no good. For Sarah, all roads lead to Jimmy. Thus, the quest begins.
author: Roger Alan Bonner
